title: Burn, bury or what?
brief_description: Describes how the District of Columbia solved its problem of solid waste disposal by developing a technically sound long-range plan. Illustrates how other cities can solve solid waste disposal problems by using sanitary landfill, accomplished through the use of the latest engineering techniques.
